${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:CondorEgg.NAME: Condor Egg
${modID}:CondorEgg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Next turn, double your *Flight.

${modID}:EggBandit.NAME: Egg Bandit
${modID}:EggBandit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not contain "Egg", then deal !${modID}:ExtraDmg! for each remaining card.

${modID}:Omelette.NAME: Omelette
${modID}:Omelette.DESCRIPTION: Activate all of your Next Turn effects immediately.

${modID}:EggOn.NAME: Egg On
${modID}:EggOn.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 *Weak and 1 *Vulnerable for each Next Turn effect you have.

${modID}:Incubation.NAME: Incubation
${modID}:Incubation.DESCRIPTION: Double any Next Turn effects you have.

${modID}:Eggshell.NAME: Eggshell
${modID}:Eggshell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Next turn, gain !M! *Flight.

${modID}:SkyDrop.NAME: Sky Drop
${modID}:SkyDrop.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 *Sky *Drop. NL When a creature loses its *Sky *Drop, it takes !M! damage for each *Sky *Drop lost.

${modID}:AerialAce.NAME: Aerial Ace
${modID}:AerialAce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage if the target is *Vulnerable.

${modID}:Gust.NAME: Gust
${modID}:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard the rightmost card in your hand.

${modID}:EagleEgg.NAME: Eagle Egg
${modID}:EagleEgg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Next turn, apply !M! *Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Tailwind.NAME: Tailwind
${modID}:Tailwind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain *Flight, gain an addition !M! *Flight.

${modID}:OstrichForm.NAME: Ostrich Form
${modID}:OstrichForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Strength. NL Gain !M! *Dexterity. NL Lose !M! *Flight at the start of each turn.
